title: Illumination
description: Tormented by a past he discovered had never existed, the hunter, Seth, had begun to suspect the unpalatable, unbelievable truth long before he came face to face with ... himself, the rogue Cyborg, Simon-identical to him in every way but one-Simon had no soul. He hadn't been born. Simon had been created in a lab just as his partner Cole had been. But-how was that possible? Wanting answers, needing them, they joined forces to discover the truth, to find their creator. Instead, they found the creator's daughter, Claire. Carnal Erotic.
author: Kaitlyn O'Connor
